TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Font2 implements class Microsoft.Office.Core._IMsoDispObj

Docs.summary: Contains font attributes (for example, font name, font size, and color) for an object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Allcaps { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

Docs.summary: True if the font is formatted as all capital letters. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets an object that represents the application the object is used in. Read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the numbers in a numbered list should be rotated when the text is rotated. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float BaselineOffset { float get(); void set(float value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the horizontal offset of the selected font. Read/write.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the font should be bold. Read/write.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying that the text should be capitalized. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating the application the object was created in. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState DoubleStrikeThrough { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState value); };

Docs.summary: True if the specified font is formatted as double strikethrough text. Read/write.

public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState Embedded { Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoTriState get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value specifying whether the font is embedded in a page. Read-only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the text for a selection should be spaced equal distances apart. Read/write.

public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::LineFormat ^ Line { Microsoft::Office::Core::LineFormat ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value specifiying the format of a line. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the font to use for a selection. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NameAscii { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the font used for Latin text (characters with character codes from 0 (zero) through 127). Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NameComplexScript { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the complex script font name. Used for mixed language text. Read/write.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an East Asian font name. Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NameOther { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the font used for characters whose character set numbers are greater than 127. Read/write.

public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the parent of the object. Read-only.

public: property Microsoft::Office::Core::ColorFormat ^ UnderlineColor { Microsoft::Office::Core::ColorFormat ^ get(); };
